newsitem.title: CHINA: Kowloon Motor Bus ponders restructuring.
newsitem.headline: Kowloon Motor Bus ponders restructuring.

text.p: The Kowloon Motor Bus Co (1933) Ltd said on Tuesday it was considering a group restructure.
"The company and its subsidiaries are considering an internal group restructuring for the purposes of streamlining operations," the company said in a statement.
"But such restructuring will not involve any significant acquisitions or disposals of any assets or businesses by the group from or to any party outside the group," it said.
Kowloon Motor Bus is a franchised public bus service operator.
